headline: Perks and benefits like you would not believe.
copy_left: At Cardinal, our mission is to be the Insulating Glass supplier of choice in the residential window and door market by enhancing our culture of excellence, partnering with our customers, developing leaders, while creating life lasting opportunities for our employees. We go beyond a benefit package and competitive wages by offering opportunities for growth both horizontally and vertically.
copy_right: That means as your technical and soft skills increase so does your paycheck, whether you take on additional responsibilities or not. If you’re looking to grow your opportunities, we offer leadership development programs and have a long history of internal promotions that have led to successful careers.

safety_copy: The Safety of Employees is our number #1 priority. To prove it, Cardinal IG Hood River, has become Oregon OSHA’s 21st Voluntary Protective Programs (VPP) Star Certified workplace. The VPP Star certification recognizes employers who go beyond what is required by their industry safety standards. VPP certified jobsites have up to 80% fewer workday injuries than those of a similar workplace that is not certified, helping to assure our employees they have a safe place to work.
safety_link: Find Out More: https://www.osha.gov/vpp/all-about-vpp
